title: Pauletta
description: Icon Pauletta Patton hosts a live audience talk-show where she speaks with celebrity guests, features fascinating stories, and grants wishes.
altHero: Pauletta, a black woman with short hair wearing pastel purple, speaks into a microphone on set
alt1: wide shot of Pauletta on set in front of a studio audience
alt4: Pauletta holding up a Clovers cheer uniform
